summary: REQ-6 and REQ-7 appear implemented: the ContactSection location card heading shows only the Scotland flag emoji and no "Location?" text is present; the Footer attribution was replaced with the exact requested sentence and no caffeine.ai attribution/link is shown. However, additional non-requested meta/state files were modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified repository meta/summary file not requested by the BuildRequest (frontend-file-summaries.txt).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for changes in ContactSection.tsx and Footer.tsx; no requirement mentions updating this summary file.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project state tracking file not requested by the BuildRequest (project_state.json).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requirements are limited to UI text changes in two specific React components; it does not request changing internal tracking/state JSON.
